title: Display,L, Preamble, XL
code:
<gds-flex max-width="900px" padding="5xl" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="2xl">
  <gds-text text-align="center "font="display-l">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge.
  </gds-text>
    <gds-text max-width="800px" padding="0 2xl 0 2xl" color="neutral-02" text-align="center "font="preamble-xl">We have committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-badge variant="notice">2XL (32)</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
